returns._0: The current total of all tokens

award(address,uint256,address).details: The amount awarded must be less than the awardBalance()

params._amount: The amount of assets to be awarded
params._controlledToken: The address of the asset token being awarded
params._to: The address of the winner that receives the award

returns._0: The total amount of assets to be awarded for the current prize

awardExternalERC20(address,address,uint2.details: Used to award any arbitrary tokens held by the Prize Pool

params._amount: The amount of external assets to be awarded
params._externalToken: The address of the external asset token being awarded
params._to: The address of the winner that receives the award

awardExternalERC721(address,address,uint.details: Used to award any arbitrary NFTs held by the Prize Pool

params.externalToken: The address of the external NFT token being awarded
params.to: The address of the winner that receives the award
params.tokenIds: An array of NFT Token IDs to be transferred

balance().details: Returns the total underlying balance of all assets. This includes both principal and interest.

canAwardExternal(address).details: Checks with the Prize Pool if a specific token type may be awarded as an external prize

params._externalToken: The address of the token to check

returns._0: True if the token may be awarded, false otherwise
The total amount of assets to be awarded for the current prize

params._compLike: The COMP-like token held by the prize pool that should be delegated

params.amount: The amount of assets to deposit
params.controlledToken: The address of the type of token the user is minting
params.to: The address receiving the newly minted tokens

params._controlledTokens: Array of ControlledTokens that are controlled by this Prize Pool.
Array of addresses for the Ticket and Sponsorship Tokens controlled by the Prize Pool

isControlled(address).details: Checks if a specific token is controlled by the Prize Pool

params.controlledToken: The address of the token to check

returns._0: True if the token is a controlled token, false otherwise

params._data: Additional data with no specified format, sent in call to `_to`.
params._from: The current owner of the NFT
params._operator: The address that acts on behalf of the owner

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._liquidityCap: The new liquidity cap for the prize pool

token().details: Returns the address of the underlying ERC20 asset

tokenAtIndex(uint256).details: Returns the address of a token in the _tokens array.

returns._0: An array of controlled token addresses

transferExternalERC20(address,address,ui.details: Used to transfer out tokens held by the Prize Pool.  Could be liquidated, or anything.

params._amount: The amount of external assets to be awarded
params._externalToken: The address of the external asset token being awarded
params._to: The address of the winner that receives the award

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to redeem for assets.
params.controlledToken: The address of the token to redeem (i.e. ticket or sponsorship)
params.from: The address to redeem tokens from.

accountedBalance().notice: The total of all controlled tokens

award(address,uint256,address).notice: Called by the prize strategy to award prizes.

awardBalance().notice: Returns the balance that is available to award.

awardExternalERC20(address,address,uint2.notice: Called by the Prize-Strategy to award external ERC20 prizes

awardExternalERC721(address,address,uint.notice: Called by the prize strategy to award external ERC721 prizes

captureAwardBalance().notice: Captures any available interest as award balance.

compLikeDelegate(address,address).notice: Delegate the votes for a Compound COMP-like token held by the prize pool

depositTo(address,uint256,address).notice: Deposit assets into the Prize Pool in exchange for tokens

initializeYieldSourcePrizePool(address[].notice: Initializes the Prize Pool and Yield Service with the required contract connections

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Required for ERC721 safe token transfers from smart contracts.

setLiquidityCap(uint256).notice: Allows the Governor to set a cap on the amount of liquidity that he pool can hold

setPrizeStrategy(address).notice: Sets the prize strategy of the prize pool.  Only callable by the owner.

tokens().notice: An array of the Tokens controlled by the Prize Pool (ie. Tickets, Sponsorship)

transferExternalERC20(address,address,ui.notice: Called by the Prize-Strategy to transfer out external ERC20 tokens

withdrawFrom(address,uint256,address).notice: Withdraw assets from the Prize Pool instantly.  A fairness fee may be charged for an early exit.
